Function DB-LOCK-DETECT

Syntax:

db-lock-detect &optional atype &key environment flags => aborted

Arguments and Values:

atype---one of :default, :expire, :maxlocks, :minlocks, :minwrite, :oldest, :random or :youngest

environment---an environment

flags---an integer

Description:

Runs one iteration of the deadlock detector and returns the number of lock requests which were rejected.
